name: snatch22
text: A little Rebel Without a Cause?

name: scorpio_nadir
text: A little Cat With a Milk Mustache?

name: weretrout
text: How does this not have many chubbies? I mean come on people!

name: knuckleheadbabylon
text: Teodor was in the middle of some extreme Parkour action.

name: internnumber1
text: Ray reminds me of Kiefer Sutherland in 'Stand By Me' here. Teodor is one joke away from seeing the ole switchblade.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: I'll say something about Ray; he doesn't do anything half-assed. In order to drink a glass of milk, he rolls up his pants, dons a flat-top wig, gets a white T-shirt and hits the stoop. This is the man we all wish we could be.

name: rumblefish
text: This is the mark of the ridiculously wealthy...to manifest passing fancies with little to no effort.

name: saint
text: Question: is your avatar Seamus from WWE RAW?

name: rumblefish
text:
No.
That would be Me from My Home Office

name: jdhenry105
text: Wig?

name: semiquaver
text: Wig...?  I prefer to think that he spent months (years?  He's a cat, who knows...) growing out his hair *specifically* to drink a glass of milk that he needs out of the house for the purpose of bloody mary mix storage.  Maybe he bought a whole new fridge to accommodate the situation.  Maybe a whole new pint of milk.

name: jthm_guitarist
text: It said "Soon."

name: mugi
text: It's all relative.

name: semiquaver
text: That li'l otter is gonna be five forever.  They've got plenty of time for a little hair growth.

name: soticoto
text: And milk that never goes off, presumably.

name: hawaiian_robot
text: Also don't forget the Converse shoes he's wearing

name: howard
text: The cigarette packet up the sleeve is hella old-school.

name: tim_simmons
text: i know dudes from japan who do this in the city and i think they are in a [i]gang[/] because one time i was all 'hi' and a massive dude frisked me.

name: tim_simmons
text: wait ... maybe he just liked me?

name: dusty
text: he might have thought you were saying "Hai" which means yes, but can also be taken to mean "Now!" or it can be an informal call to pay attention, similar to "yo".

name: phthoggos
text: Seriously it has been so long since I straight up drank a glass of milk

name: nutmeg
text: Me too! Lactose intolerant, though.

name: tekende
text: A comment left by tekende was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by greenery, twells, usversusthem)

name: tekende
text: Two lames? What the hell? Was that offensive or something?

name: apocowarg
text:
Maybe those two people thought you were recycling an old Seinfeld joke.

"I'm lactose intolerant. I have no patience for lactose and I won't stand for it."

name: tekende
text: You know, that probably affected my comment subconsciously, though I wasn't thinking about that episode at the time.

name: soticoto
text: Nope. Just a really REALLY bad joke.

name: straw
text: I just did!

name: spinynorman
text: It's a dandy good time!

name: thommy_h
text: Teodor is always exercising, so why is he still a chunky little fucker?

name: turnabout
text: Perfecting risotto has its price.

name: deancain29
text: its a careful balance of risotto and Parkour so that hes in shape for S.B movies

name: rumblefish
text: Also, he's a stuffed animal. Exercise may not burn fluff as vigorously as it does fat.

name: sargasm
text: Ray makes a Bloody Mary with a mix?

name: turnabout
text: He premixes his own stuff and lets it sit at least 24 hours so that the flavors come together properly.

name: riazm
text: Yeah..actually yeah I've been meaning to start doing this.

name: woof
text: alt text: If you don't know who Michael Flatley is, then you have never seen two legs truly a-twitter.

name: tinhand
text: I love how Ray sees drinking a glass of milk as an amazing and unheard-of idea. A special occasion, even.

name: soticoto
text: What? You think milk-drinking is like... common or something?

name: foetus_punch
text: Yeah, it was weird when I was in a room and I offhandedly mentioned drinking straight milk and how weird it is, and everyone turned on me like I was the crazy one. Total Malign paradigm shift.

name: qatipay
text:
Two whole birds in the fridge?
This is Ray's house.

name: rmj12345
text:
You know they're not just supermarket chickens, either. I'm sure they're straight-up wild game that he suddenly got a hankering for - like, one's a grouse and one's a quail.

He probably made hunting a thing earlier this week, and paid some big name in hunting that he saw on ESPN 8 to take him out and shoot those birds.

name: tablesawsafety
text: this is one of my favorite strips because of ray's reactions to teodor. while teodor is just taking the usual piss out of ray's appearance, ray is perfectly aware of what he looks like at that moment

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Yeah, Ray's self-confidence is virtually unshakable. "Good to see you, despite the comment!" What a cool cat.

name: solobuttons
text: Ray just has to make the act of drinking milk into a Thing

name: mangtastic
text:
People are afraid to give you that third lame.
They are thinking "This comment might be lame, but do I want to be responsible for hiding this asset? Would I be a dick by doing that?"

Let us hope that nobody lames this asset any more. Just because .

name: rowboat
text: It's still 498 lames away from being hidden from me. I see all.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: This is a fabulous strip. I'd completely forgotten about this one.

name: phthoggos
text: Secret to being awesome: say to yourself at every opportunity, "hold on, wait. I got to do this right."

name: ocarinak
text: How many wigs does Ray have?

name: synnah
text: Including the Merkin? Probably about five.

name: waldo913
text: T is right though, a little less Vietnam is a surefire way to make any joke a little less unfunny.

name: saint
text: I had to think about that for a minute. The double negative caught me off guard.

name: falseprophet
text: A War And A Musical , the sequel to An Officer And A Gentleman , by Ray.

name: synnah
text: It is impossible to quantify the amount of ass Ray kicks in this strip.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: on a scale of 3,000 he's kickin' about 2,375 here.

name: breccia
text:
I just wanted everyone to know that I had to print this comic out and put it on my parent's refrigerator while they were sleeping because my dad just acted out the first four panels.

He has never read Achewood before. It was a special moment for us all.

name: foetus_punch
text: Chubbied for the Terry Pratchett reference/Office avatar/amusing anecdote. You got the perfect trifecta, man!

name: tekende
text: Pratchett reference? Where?

name: foetus_punch
text: His name is breccia.

name: breccia
text:
Breccia is also a type of rock.

I like rocks.

name: foetus_punch
text: I'm a fool. Also...weird amount of geology buffs on this site, huh?

name: bixschmix
text: Yes, I've noticed that too. I suppose that people that like rocks also tend to like sassy cats.

name: howl
text: aren't those things like the opposite of each other though?

name: rowboat
text: Rock hard cat rocks?

name: spicyponyhead
text: I wish I could give this more chubbies.

name: rowboat
text: I'm trying to revisit the state of mind I was in when I wrote that. I'm afraid that it is unknowable.

name: skyisfalling
text: Stray Cat Rock: Sex Hunter

name: vermy
text:
"You're the one who turned it into war and a musical!"
My favorite strip

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Roast Beef: I could not eat the chips I wanted so bad.
Teodor: I have gotten the hang of "Asian"-flavored slaw.
Philippe: What did I do to Franky?

name: mangtastic
text: Oh shiiiiiit, I hit "lame" instead of "chubby".  My bad.

name: pinballchacha
text: That "Asian"-flavoured slaw is good stuff.

name: rowboat
text: I'm really feelin' Beef, here. I live in a very small place with a very light sleeper.

name: i_love_kate
text: On the one hand I am pleased that Philippe is not holding himself responsible for the bird's mother's death, but on the other hand I'm sorta pissed that he's transferred the blame to Lyle.

name: stewieisgod13
text: Michael Flatley!! <3!

name: norsef
text: Its Ray's self conscious expression in panel 8 that makes it.

name: madrin
text: this has gotta be one of my favourite strips.

name: jaredwilde
text:
After reading this strip, I cold went and drank a glass of milk. No lie. I forewent the hair (being bald) though I did borrow my roommates smokes and proceeded to roll them up in my sleeve.

Felt RIGHT, y'know?

name: nice-on-water
text: I have an apple after lunch and/or dinner and walk back to my dorm with my friends just straight munching an apple.  I think that's pretty old school.

name: dorothyzbornak
text: ray is funny.

name: rowen
text:
Newest line of escape from a conversation gone wrong.
"Hey man, you're the one who turned this into war and a musical."
"What?"
"Thats what I thought." Exit stage left.

name: broahsaurus
text: If this strip ended at panel 5 it would still be perfect .

name: dasilodavi
text: This got out of hand kind of quick.

name: jaldor
text: Ray has two whole roast turkeys in his fridge.

name: duperando
text: Ray is cool, he does things in style, but he is just hell of defensive /

name: vampirotica
text: aw dang classic black-and-white converse, hella oldschool.
